column1: Suncoast Parkway runs north and south along the western edge of Land o' Lakes (actually closer to Odessa).
U.S. Route 41 (Land o' Lakes Boulevard) is the main north-south road in Land o' Lakes as well as the rest of central Pasco County.
SR 54 is the main east-west road that runs through southern Pasco County
column2: from US 19 near Holiday to US 301 in Zephyrhills.

column1: County Road 583 (Ehren Cutoff) runs northeast to southwest from US 41 to SR 52 in rural Pasco County.
An honorary mayor position was established by area residents in 1968. The honorary mayor has no real political power and only has ceremonial duties.
Public district schools are operated by the Pasco County Schools.
